answers.answer: Hi,If you have put on weight recently, try to reduce it. Other causes may be  organ specific or circulatory problems caused by many reasons, including diabetes. Consult a urologist for organ specific issues, followed by a general health check up if the organ does not have any disease.Taking balanced food, having a healthy digestive system, doing regular moderate exercise, staying away from drugs, smoking, alcohol and fast food are all essential for general health of all our organs.Solace
